content:
Please provide me with the Fear and Greed index scores for for Feb 30th, 2025 and Feb 31th, 2025? Additionally, I would like to know the rating for each date.
Begin!
The date format for Feb 30th, 2025 is incorrect because February does not have 30 days. I will now check the Fear and Greed index for Feb 29th, 2025 instead.

It appears that the date format is still incorrect for Feb 29th, 2025 because that date doesn't exist in the calendar. I should focus on a valid date range for the Fear and Greed index. I will try Feb 1st, 2025 to get the index and rating.

name: historical_for_fear_and_greed_index
